title: Setting Group Contacts
answer:
Type 1: Contacts > Switch the tab page to the groups page > Select Group > Menu > Add members > Select members and click the icon in the lower right corner to add a member. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109943) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109944)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109945) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109946)
